sentences.en: At the recent convention a declaration was adopted.
sentences.cn: 在最近举行的大会上通过了一项宣言.

sentences.en: He returned his earnings as & 3000 on the tax declaration.
sentences.cn: 他在纳税申报单上填报了个人所得为3000镑.

sentences.en: His conduct is the best comment on his declaration.
sentences.cn: 他的行为是他的宣言的最好说明.

sentences.en: In September 1950, 1,527 leading Christians signed the declaration.
sentences.cn: 1950年9月, 1527位基督教负责人签名拥护"三自宣言".

sentences.en: On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentences.cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentences.en: The declaration was drafted by a committee chaired by Dr Robert Song.
sentences.cn: 宣言由罗伯特·桑博士领导的委员会起草。

sentences.en: The one who received the largest number of affirmative declaration was nominated.
sentences.cn: 得到最大多数人同意的候选者就成为被提名的人.

sentences.en: The parliament has voted by an overwhelming majority to suspend its declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 议会以压倒性的多数票决定推迟宣布独立。

sentences.en: The resolution stopped short of an outright declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 这项决议几乎成为公开的独立宣言。

sentences.en: The Secretary General says the declaration must now be backed up by concrete and effective actions.
sentences.cn: 秘书长说现在必须将宣言付诸具体有效的行动。

sentences.en: The wind that carried the declaration of the dying sun has gone.
sentences.cn: 风带着夕阳的宣言去了.

sentences.en: They will sign the declaration tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他们明天将签署这份公告。

sentences.en: This invasion is tantamount to a declaration of war.
sentences.cn: 这次侵略就相当于宣战.

sentences.en: Under Islamic law it was possible to divorce by simple declaration.
sentences.cn: 从前按照伊斯兰法律，作简单的声明就可以离婚。
